extendedInfo.description: -- PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU NEED UCCW APP TO USE IT! GET IT HERE http://goo.gl/PmFJa --*FEATURES*-two colors to choose from! (paid version have eight colors)> CLOCK:-three editable hotspots! (placed on clock, date and weather)-editable time format!> DOCK:-five editable hotspots! (you can choose which spot launches which app)* INSTRUCTIONS *To use this skin, you must have UCCW http://goo.gl/PmFJaPlace a UCCW widget on the homescreen.This will open the skins list. Skins downloaded from play store will show up ONLY HERE. Select the skin from here and you're done.Resize it anyway you want to best suit your screen.* TIPS / TROUBLESHOOT *-To change time format/hotspots, make sure hotspot mode is off, then tap on widget already placed on homescreen. You will have access to editor, where you can choose time format and apps assigned to hotspots.-Make sure hotspot mode is on. Launch UCCW app, tap Menu and then tap "hotspot mode". Make sure "ON" is selected.If weather doesn't work, make sure to switch on location access from your devices settings.If the skin is not showing up in skin list, do the following -Launch Titanium Backup and scroll down the list of installed apps.Tap the downloaded UCCW Skin and tap backup. DON'T uninstall anything.Tap the skin name again and restore the same backup that you had just created. Select "App + Data" when prompted during restore.Now the skin will show up as mentioned. If it doesn't or if you are on a non-rooted device, send me a mail and I'll send you another fix for this.IF YOU LIKE THIS WIDGET, PLEASE RATE IT 5 STARS AND LEAVE A COMMENT :)

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Love the look of this skin. I would like to have the ability to \"Americanize\" it a little bit, for example; I wish I could have the option to switch the day and month and display temperature in Fahrenheit. But still, it looks great and works great, so no complaints.
reviews.author: Evan Johnson

reviews.comment: Another awesome work mate! Keep it up
reviews.author: Rittik Bhowmik
